txt.en:
'Everything is prepared, [placeholder]. You have secured enough merchants to attend the auction that I feel comfortable with how much this night will yield for me. I have gone through Andras' goods and believe that if he gets a fair value, he should be able to honour his debts, even after my share is paid.

'Speak with me when you are ready to attend the auction.'

<rgb=#FF0000>WARNING: This is a solo instance and cannot be completed in a fellowship.</rgb>
'It is always a pleasure to do business with Saruman of Many Colours, and always a mistake to challenge a Wizard.\n\n'The debt is now the son's to bear and pay. He will work it off, beginning today.'
'Are you ready to begin?'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>WARNING: This is a solo instance and cannot be completed in a fellowship.</rgb>
Merchants of the Ox-clan gather frequently for auctions, where large amounts of goods -- and money -- trade hands.
Bedwur is at Avardin, central to the Starkmoor.\n\nBedwur is waiting for you to begin the auction.
Bedwur is at Avardin, central to the Starkmoor.\n\nBedwur will want to discuss the events of the Auction.
